snippet: A man who attended a religious retreat with Pedro Hernandez in 1979 testified that Mr. Hernandez, who is charged with murdering Etan Patz, told him he had killed a boy in the basement of a grocery store.
abstract: Ramon Rodriguez, witness called in Etan Patz murder trial, says that suspect Pedro Hernandez confessed to him in 1979 that he killed a little boy in the basement of a grocery store; testimony marks first time in trial that witness has offered evidence to back up Hernandez's admission of guilt.
lead_paragraph: A man who attended a religious retreat with Pedro Hernandez in 1979 testified that Mr. Hernandez, who is charged with murdering Etan Patz, told him he had killed a boy in the basement of a grocery store.

headline.main: In Patz Trial, Witness Says Defendant Confessed to Him
headline.print_headline: In Patz Trial, Witness Says Defendant Confessed to Him
